# Task Breakdown Skill

## Overview

This skill focuses on breaking down complex work into manageable, actionable tasks.

## Key Capabilities

- Decomposing large features into smaller tasks
- Estimating effort and complexity
- Identifying dependencies between tasks
- Creating clear task descriptions

## Best Practices

- Keep tasks focused and single-purpose
- Define clear completion criteria
- Identify blockers and dependencies early
- Prioritize tasks based on value and risk
